C

canMove(PawnController, Coord) - Static method in class engine.Rules
from the controller position, tells if it can move into the given direction.
canMove(PawnController, Coord, Coord) - Static method in class engine.Rules
does the same as the 2 parameters canMove but it checks from a given coordinates instead of the controller's coordinates.
canPlaceWall(PawnController[], PawnController, Coord, Coord) - Static method in class engine.Rules
is a global verification combining Rules.validPlacement(Coord, Coord, Board) and Rules.pathOrNot(PawnController).
Cell - Class in world
represents one cell of the board.
Cell(Coord, int) - Constructor for class world.Cell
initiate a cell with his coordinates on the board and a wall if the cell is at board's boarder.
cellArray - Variable in class world.Board
2 dimensional array representing the cells of the board with associate coordinates
controller - package controller
 
Controller - Class in controller
tha base of all controller type with the minimum requirement.
Controller(boolean, MOAI, Board) - Constructor for class controller.Controller
 
coord - Variable in class items.MOAI
 
coord - Variable in class world.Cell
the coordinates of the cell in the board.
Coord - Class in tools
class that represents a coord within a board with (ordinate, absciss) format.
Coord(int, int) - Constructor for class tools.Coord
represents something on a 2D cartesian coordinate system with (y,x) format
